2280/A0/04/803/001.status_value: Annual and quarterly reports produced and disseminated via the Internet on all forms of child abuse by age  gender and location by the Office of the Children's Registry.  Data uploaded to the Child Protection Database by eight of twelve partners with data disaggregated by age  gender and location.  Information Technology Audit conducted to determine the data management capabilities of each member of the Child Protection Database and an implementation plan was developed for improved efficiency.
2280/A0/04/803/001.indicator_name: # of efficient  computerized databases  # of trained personnel in Child Protection Database agencies  status of disaggregated quarterly and annual reports
2280/A0/04/803/001.headline: Some VAC data gaps were filled by the Jamaica Crime Observatory- Integrated Crime and Violence Information System (JCO-ICVIS) of the Ministry of National Security.
2280/A0/04/803/001.baseline_value: No agency reporting quarterly  Seven agencies report annually but not by age  gender and location
